titles.title: Though the earth be removed and the mountains shake

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Though the earth be removed and the mountains shake
Though the waters roar and the nations rage
I will stand still and see your salvation, Lord
For you make all wars to cease

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
The Lord of Hosts is with us
The Lord of Hosts is with us
The God of Jacob is our refuge
He's our very present help
Be still and know the Great I AM
The Lord of Hosts is with us
Be still and know the Great I AM
The Lord of Hosts is here.
